Standard of the Damned

two handed weapon (lvl 6)

item id [id]: 106
spell [itemspell]: #659 Drain Life
fear [fear]: +5
weap id [weapon]: 100 (Standard)
resource cost [rcost]: 3
damage [dmg]: 1
attack [att]: -2
defence [def]: -3
length [len]: 4
nbr of attacks [nratt]: 1
 
Material Composition: Flammable
(Requires Two Hands [twohanded], Nonmagical, Bludgeoning Damage [blunt], Magic weapon [magic])

Requires 25D to forge (D4)

This standard drains life energy from enemies and adds it to the owner of the standard. The standard also causes fear in all nearby enemies.
